title: // Resources
description: Health information alerts for the public
cleaned_text: The latest Public Health Alerts sent via email (previously HealthFAX sent via fax and email) are found linked below by year. Health care and community partners can register to receive Public Health Alerts by email when they are published. If you previously received HealthFAXes by email or fax, you must register to continue receiving these communications by email. Community partners and health professionals can [register here](https://www.simcoemuskokahealth.org/JFY/HPPortal/ResourcesTools/RAVE-Collection-of-Contact-Information) to receive Public Health Alert emails. Information for the general public is available on the main SMDHU website [here.](https://www.simcoemuskokahealth.org/) Earlier HealthFAXes are maintained in an archive and can be retrieved by calling Health Connection weekdays 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. at
